item.title: Fly tipping and piles of rubbish, 4th August
item.description:
Again, just before the junction there are big piles of rubbish and fly tipping. Notably on the opposite side of the road there is none (looked after by Bexley Council) - the rubbish mentioned above has been there for months so assume Greenwich Council have not actioned or made any effort to remove the rubbish
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter issue at 64 Victoria Street, Westminster, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Flytip at the top of roydene road is now a health hazard, 4th August
item.description:
